argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hstrlem3.1 | |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) |
| 2 |  | hstrlem3.2 | |- ( ph <-> ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) ) |
| 3 |  | hstrlem3.3 | |- A e. CH |
| 4 |  | hstrlem3.4 | |- B e. CH |
| 5 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( u e. ( A \ B ) -> u e. A ) |
| 6 | 3 | #P_cheli | |- ( u e. A -> u e. ~H ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( u e. ( A \ B ) -> u e. ~H ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_hstrlem3a | |- ( ( u e. ~H /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) -> S e. CHStates ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( u e. ( A \ B ) /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) -> S e. CHStates ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_sylbi | |- ( ph -> S e. CHStates ) |
